title: Responsive Design
excerpt: Creating flexible layouts that adapt to various screen sizes and devices.
content:
Responsive design is an approach to web design that makes web pages render well on a variety of devices and window or screen sizes. It's essential in today's multi-device world.

Key Principles

  • Fluid grids
  • Flexible images
  • Media queries
  • Mobile-first approach

Best Practices

  1. Design with flexible layouts that can adapt to different screen sizes
  2. Use relative units (%, em, rem) instead of fixed pixel values
  3. Implement breakpoints to adjust layouts for different devices
  4. Optimize images and media for different screen resolutions
  5. Test your design on various devices and screen sizes
